subject: One Time Exercise to fill up the Vacancies of the Key Personnel in the Ongoing Projects by the Consultants (IE/AE/SC) to ensure Mobilization of full Supervision Team reg.
text: HRa 74 rTHTf gifea5rut (43a qRdet e rorrf 4714, 4Ra TaT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) dr Ta #-5 & 6, #ir-10, ana;, #Rait 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TA/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI Policy Guidelines/ Consultancy/ 2025 Policy Circular No. 10.1.41/2025 dated O9th June, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. SRDQ-11013/2/2025-SRD&Q Division (Comp. No. 284276)} Sub: One Time Exercise to fill up the Vacancies of the Personnel in the Ongoing Projects by the Consultants (IEIAEISC) to ensure Mobilization of full Supervision Team Ref. : (i) Policy Circular No. 10.1.30/2021 dated 15th November 2021 . (ii) Corrigendum on above  Policy Circular   issued vide Policy Circular No: 10.1.35/2022 dated 11th October 2022_ (iii) Policy Circular No. 10.1.36/2023 dated 26th September 2023. (iv) Policy Circular No. 10.2.35/2024 dated 23rd January 2024. (v) Policy Circular No. 10.1.40/2025 dated 29th 2025. It has been observed that there are large nos. of Vacancies of Personnel in the Ongoing Projects by the Consultants (IE/AEISC) and replacements are not being effected in a timely manner. Non-Availability of Personnel has definite impact on the output and adversely affecting the Quality of Construction and Maintenance. 2. This aspect has been deliberated in detail and it has been decided that a Special Drive shall be initiated forthwith to fill the Vacancy of the Personnel with one time dispensation of certain Conditions in Project Interest as per the following modalities: a) RO/PD shall sensitize all the Consulting Firms and obtain the CVs for replacement of existing Vacancies of Personnel immediately. b) Once the replacement CV has been provided by the Consulting Firms, ROs shall evaluate the CV (as per Original evaluation sheet at the time of bidding) and in case such evaluated CV is better or equivalent to the originally approved CV then RO shall forthwith approve the same for deployment: For this purpose, the requirement of interaction of the Personnel by the Expert Committee as per Policy Circular No.10.1.30/2021 dated 15th November 2021, is now dispensed with for a period of 30 days from the issuance of this Circular. However, the approval shall be n provisional basis for a period of 3 to 6 months as per the requirement and their performance shall be evaluated for further continuation at the Level of RO_ c) In case of exigency, the Personnel   proposed for replacement   having Technical Score up to 90% of the replaced Personnel may also be permitted by RO during this one time drive period of 30 days, with proportionate reduction in remuneration.
